survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace Noise Reduction Solutions Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness of current noise reduction solutions in the workplace and identify areas for improvement to enhance productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise reduction solutions in your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity and ease of response. Ensure the options are evenly spaced to avoid bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question, displayed as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current noise reduction solutions in your workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions are currently available in your workspace? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to assess awareness and availability of solutions. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted solutions.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question, displayed as checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following noise reduction solutions are currently available in your workspace? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please describe any specific noise-related issues you frequently encounter in your workspace.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture detailed feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text question, displayed as a text area.

script.question_text: Please describe any specific noise-related issues you frequently encounter in your workspace.

questions.question_text: Which additional noise reduction solutions would you recommend for your workspace?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to gather suggestions for improvements. Include an 'Other' option for additional recommendations.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice question, displayed as checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which additional noise reduction solutions would you recommend for your workspace?

questions.question_text: How often do noise distractions impact your productivity at work?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure the options are clear and unambiguous.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice question, displayed as radio buttons.

script.question_text: How often do noise distractions impact your productivity at work?
